nodes.bodyText: There's a native test failure that seems related to that line. Was it moved upstream too?

thanks, looks like something is wrong.  The upstream metadata is rather different, I've been trying to optimise it further - I did run all Quarkus tests during its development, but looks like I screwed something up during the last polishing phase. I'll re-introduce this file so to add the missing entry.
This needs to be removed since it's a duplicate of the other hibernate-graalvm dependency.
